metadata.title: CVE-2019-20021 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
A heap-based buffer over-read was discovered in canUnpack in p_mach.cpp inUPX 3.95 via a crafted Mach-O file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20021` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

upx-ucl - 3.96-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: upx-ucl package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.96-2').
